sense.def:
To lock something
pomeni nekaj zapreti s ključem.

seg.quote: Lock the door after you leave.

sense.def:
To lock something in a cupboard, room, or drawer
pomeni nekaj dati v kredenco, sobo ali predal in zakleniti vrata ali predal.

seg.quote: He had locked all his papers in the safe.
He locked them away in a drawer.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
locks
ali
is locked
, se premakne v določeni položaj in tam trdno stoji.

seg.quote: Smoothly the rod locked into place.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
are locked in a fight or argument
, se ne morejo nehati bojevati ali prepirati.

seg.quote: Rebel groups and government forces are locked in a fierce battle for control of the country.

sense.def:
The lock on something
je del nečesa, na primer vrat, ki tisto pritrdi, kadar zavrtimo ključ.

seg.quote: The key rattling in the lock startled me.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
under lock and key
, je v zaklenjeni sobi ali škatli.

seg.quote: She would keep any sensitive documents under lock and key.

sense.def:
A lock on a canal
je del prekopa med pregradama, kjer lahko dvignemo ali spustimo gladino vode, da se čolni lahko premaknejo v višji ali nižji del prekopa.

A lock of hair
je majhen čop las;

seg.quote: A lock of hair had fallen down over her eyes.

sense.def:
To be locked up
pomeni priti v zapor ali psihiatrično bolnišnico.

seg.quote: The idea of being locked up in jail filled her with horror.

sense.def:
To lock up
pomeni poskrbeti, da so vsa vrata in okna neke stavbe dobro zaprta in zaklenjena.
